Kamilou Daouda (a muru 29 Disemba 1987) bu onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Niger nke na-egwu egwu maka egwuregwu Coton Sports.
Nzọụkwụ mbụ ya ebe dị na Akokana FC, ụlọ egwuregwu amateur na Niger
Ọ nwere afọ 2 dị ezigbo mma tupu ọ kwaga Coton Sport de Garoua, otu ndị otu ọkwa kachasị elu na Elite One nke Cameroon.
Daouda bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger, ebe akpọrọ ya ka ọ gaa asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2012.
Akara na rịzọlt depụtara na mbụ ọnụọgụ goolu Niger.Ndepụta goolu mba ụwa Kamilou Daouda nyere.
